Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/28th
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Blue Island, Damen, Archer and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/28th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Blue Island, Damen, Archer and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/28th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
